devdoc.details: This version uses native MNT (msg.value) instead of ERC20 MockMNT      On Mantle, MNT is the native gas token similar to ETH on Ethereum.            Key features:      - State is (user  basketId  position) scoped      - A user can have multiple baskets with different risk profiles      - Each (user, basketId) pair is an independent position      - Uses NATIVE MNT (msg.value) as collateral       COLLATERAL FLOW:      1. User deposits native MNT collateral via msg.value      2. User can mint basket tokens if they have sufficient collateral      3. When minting, debt is created and tracked per (user, basketId)      4. When burning, debt is repaid and collateral is freed

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.basketId: The basket to deposit collateral for

mintBasket(uint256,uint256).details: Requires sufficient collateral to maintain COLLATERAL_RATIO

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256).details: Can only withdraw excess collateral that maintains required ratio

devdoc.title: BasketVault

LIQUIDATION_PENALTY().notice: Liquidation penalty in basis points (10% = 1000 bp)

authorizedFactory().notice: Authorized factory that can register basket tokens

basketOracle().notice: Reference to the basket oracle for pricing

basketTokens(uint256).notice: Mapping from basketId to its token contract

burnBasket(uint256,uint256).notice: Burn basket tokens to repay debt and free collateral

depositCollateral(uint256).notice: Deposit native MNT collateral for a specific basket

mintBasket(uint256,uint256).notice: Mint basket tokens by taking on debt

registerBasketToken(uint256,address).notice: Register a basket token for a basket

userCollateral(address,uint256).notice: User collateral per basket: user => basketId => collateral amount (in MNT, 18 decimals)

userDebt(address,uint256).notice: User debt per basket: user => basketId => debt amount (in basket tokens, 18 decimals)

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw native MNT collateral from a specific basket

userdoc.notice: Vault for managing basket-scoped collateral positions using NATIVE MNT
